name: Root me Out
description:
Help them escape from the dark roots crawling behind them!

Is it possible to escape from the roots that shackles you down?

                                                                                                                   

In Root me Out, you play as a benevolent root helping someone to get away from a toxic environment.

This game was made in in 72 hours as part of the Global Game Jam 2023, under the theme "Roots".

A team made of 3 Game Designers, 3 Game Artists and 1 composer worked on this project.

Hope you like it!
